tool_description: Generates detailed invoices and receipts for billing transactions and subscription charges.

include_taxes.description: Whether to include tax calculations in invoice

error_messages: Account not found: The specified account_id does not exist.
Invalid date range: billing_period_start must be before billing_period_end.
No transactions found: No billable transactions exist for the specified period.
Invalid format: Use one of [pdf, html, json] for invoice_format.
Tax calculation error: Unable to calculate taxes for the billing address.
usage: Provide account_id, billing_period_start, and billing_period_end to generate invoices. Optionally specify include_taxes and invoice_format preferences.

invoice_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated invoice

total_amount.description: Total invoice amount including taxes and fees

invoice_url.description: URL to access the generated invoice

due_date.description: Payment due date for the invoice
